text: Jimmy Buffett's Margaritaville is a United Statesâ€“based hospitality company. It manages and franchises a casual dining American restaurant chain, retail stores selling Jimmy Buffett-themed merchandise, and hotels. is named after Buffett's hit song "Margaritaville" and is owned by Margaritaville Holdings LLC. It was founded in 1985. Category:American restaurants Category:American hotel chains Category:1985 establishments in the United States
title: Jimmy Buffett's Margaritaville
